name: update
scenarios: 给商品创建（设置）自定义会员价

children.name: bind_alias
children.desc: 会员标识别名，当 bind_type 为1时，表示会员卡的别名

children.name: bind_type
children.desc: 绑定的会员标识的别名，目前仅支持 1-会员卡

children.name: discount_type
children.desc: 优惠类型 1：减钱 2：指定价格

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['item_id']=437539420
params['discounts']="[{"sku_id":36243868,"discount_type":2,"discount_value":300,"bind_type":1,"bind_alias":"Y3ez2yb6k34uhx"}, {"sku_id":36243868,"discount_type":2,"discount_value":100,"bind_type":1,"bind_alias":"Y2x8zfd9er27s5"},{"sku_id":36243868,"discount_type":2,"discount_value":200,"bind_type":1,"bind_alias":"Y3nqeqfe1g9kxh"}]"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.ump.memberprice.update', '1.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'437539420', 'discounts' => '[{"sku_id":36243868,"discount_type":2,"discount_value":300,"bind_type":1,"bind_alias":"Y3ez2yb6k34uhx"}, {"sku_id":36243868,"discount_type":2,"discount_value":100,"bind_type":1,"bind_alias":"Y2x8zfd9er27s5"},{"sku_id":36243868,"discount_type":2,"discount_value":200,"bind_type":1,"bind_alias":"Y3nqeqfe1g9kxh"}]', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

desc: 给商品创建（设置）自定义会员价
